body1.p: Full price 5, 7 and 10 EUR; discounted price 3, 5 and 7 EUR.
Tickets available at Bilešu paradīze box offices, on www.bilesuparadize.lv and before the performances.
Festival pass for all performances 80 EUR (discounted price 60 EUR).
Discounted price available for students, pensioners, persons with disability, members of the Choreographers Association.
There is limited number of tickets available for performances “Infade” and “24h of Sleep”.

Tickets for these performances are available only at Biļešu paradīze box offices, on www.bilesuparadize.lv, or by sending request to laiksdejotinfo@gmail.com; tickets are not available for purchase at the venues before the performances.

body2.p: Card to all classes and workshops - 30 EUR
- Külli Roosna (Estonia) and Kenneth Flak (Norway) “Responsive Body Training” 13.15-14.45 on June 4
- Virpi Juntti (Finland) Contemporary dance technique 10.00-11.30 on June 5
- Karl Saks (Estonia) Movement workshop: „Instinctive Me” on June 4 at 10.00
- Karl Saks (Estonia) Movement workshop: „Instinctive Me” on June 5 at 12.00
- Külli Roosna (Estonia) and Kenneth Flak (Norway) “Responsive Body Training” on June 6 at 12.00
To book festival pass and register for the classes, please write to laiksdejotinfo@gmail.com
